text: Hello all, Please is there a way to ensure some contents on a page is not crawled. We have the issue of duplicate text across some pages when a seo test is carried out? I will really appreciate any help on this. Thank you
Hi Stephen if you have duplicate pages just set the canonical to the original page. <https://moz.com/learn/seo/canonicalization>
This tells search engines you know it is duplicate here is the original ignore me.
In the event, that the two pages are not duplicates and only the testimonial slider is duplicated in the two pages. We will like to have both pages crawled but not crawl the testimonial slider.

Duplicate content such as a testimonials aren’t an issue. If you look on this page you will see 5 global sections “client reviews”, form section, number counter section, “case studies”, and “trusted by”.  These can be found on all our service pages. <https://www.pageonepower.com/>
It only becomes a problem if the page is basically a duplicate of another.
